content:
@jenlampton Which is the official GA module for Backdrop? https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/googleanalytics or https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/google_analytics? Can we add a notice to the non-official one redirecting people to the other?

backdrop-contrib/googleanalytics
Adds the Google Analytics web statistics tracking system to your website. - backdrop-contrib/googleanalytics
backdrop-contrib/google_analytics
This is a mirror of https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/googleanalytics - backdrop-contrib/google_analytics
It seems that https://backdropcms.org/project/googleanalytics is the only one listed on B.org...

Made a PR: https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/google_analytics/pull/1

Point to other repo by BWPanda 路 Pull Request #1 路 backdrop-contrib/google_analytics
GitHub is home to over 50 million developers working together to host and review code, manage projects, and build software together.
I was thinking about setting up mirrors for all projects that had changed their name for Backdrop so that if people are looking for them on github they'll still find them.
Yep, thanks. Mirrors are a good idea, as long as it's obvious where the canonical repo is (so we don't have issues, etc. being posted in two or more different places :smile:
